title: The wisdome of Solomon paraphrased. Written by Thomas Middleton
author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.
publisher: By Valentine Sems [i.e. Simmes], dwelling on Adling hil at the signe of the white Swanne,
notes: Signatures: A⁴ (-A2) B²  ² B⁴ C-Y⁴ 2A⁴ 2B² .
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
